HweiMod:StrangePaintbrush.NAME: Weird paintbrush
HweiMod:StrangePaintbrush.FLAVOR: New paths appear at the end of the pen.
DESCRIPTIONS: You have three chances to enter a room of the same height and a different type from the current room when selecting the room of next step.

HweiMod:Heartsteel.NAME: Heartsteel
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you deal damage to each enemy, an additional #b10% of your maximum health will be dealt as damage, then increasing your maximum health by #b2% .
